divs: Sighting DetailsOn Easter Sunday 2007, (April 8th 2007) I received a voice mail from Jason Bourne, informing me that his brother believes he was the victim of an abduction, in his home located in Milton Vermont. Currently the details are a bit cloudy, but I will update CMS as the case progresses.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Milton
There were no other sightings in Milton on or around April 9th 2007
Summary: UFO Abduction? Reported directly to State Director, Dan Lavilette
